channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best Sleeping Pads for Every Kind of Camping (2024)
item.description: Whether you’re snoozing in a campground or schlepping up to an alpine valley, these are the best pads we’ve found for resting your weary bones.

item.description: Keep your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods topped up with these WIRED-tested docking systems.

item.title: REI Co-op Cycles CTY e2.1 Review: Affordable and Dependable
item.description: REI's in-house electric bike is an affordable, fun-loving city commuter that gets better with every iteration.
